metadata.title: CVE-2022-48281 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
processCropSelections in tools/tiffcrop.c in LibTIFF through 4.5.0 has aheap-based buffer overflow (e.g., "WRITE of size 307203") via a craftedTIFF image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48281` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1').
